|brand = Pegatron |model = WL-227N |submodelappend = yes |submodel = ABAND (5G) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = A300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 1814 |device_id = 0801 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = VUI-WL227N-5G |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|chip1 = Ralink;RT2880;RT2880F, NH32900E0, 0815ST; |chip2 = Ralink;RT2850;RT2850L, CX70920C0, 0820ST; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = rt2880_iNIC |windriv =
|is_manuf = Yes |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6671;023, 6671, A812;2; |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = a/n |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/20/2008 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *Network Standard: Comply with 802.11n & 802.11a standards *Data Rate: 300Mbps Receive/Transmit PHY Rate (2 streams) *Chipset: Highly Integrated MIMO 2T3R MAC/BBP chip (RT2880) :with PCI Interface and Single-chip Transceiver (RT2850) :with 2.4GHz (low-band) and 5GHz (high-band) ISM bands *Antenna Connectors: ''Hirose'' U.FL-R-SMT-1(10) compatible *Host interface: Type III A, 124 Pin
[[Pegatron WL-227N]] - [[ASUS WL-227N]] (2.4/5GHz 802.11abgn) :Linux driver: 2008_0812_RT2880_iNIC_v1.1.8.0.tar.bz2 *[http://rt2x00.serialmonkey.com/phpBB-static/5/t-6128.html On '''rt2x00.serialmonkey.com'''] ([[ASUS WL-127n]] 2.4GHz 802.11bgn) :Used in [[ASUS DSL-N13]] (BCM6348 SoC + [https://deviwiki.com/files/Ralink/RT2880%20product%20brief.pdf RT2880] iNIC miniPCI Wi-Fi) :[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/dsl-n13 ''ASUS DSL-N13'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
==Links of Interest== :[https://fccid.io/document.php?id=1017582 Users Manual]
